mapper.select: SELECT movie_name_kr ,room_name,play_start_time ,movie_grade,p.room_num,movie_genre ,movie_running_time, movie_release_date ,p.play_num ,if(DATE_ADD( play_start_time, INTERVAL (movie_running_time)MINUTE)>'24:00:00',DATE_SUB(DATE_ADD( play_start_time, INTERVAL (movie_running_time)MINUTE), INTERVAL 24 HOUR),DATE_ADD( play_start_time, INTERVAL (movie_running_time)MINUTE)) AS end_time ,play_time_type ,movie_name_en FROM PLAYS p JOIN MOVIES m ON m.movie_num=p.movie_num JOIN ROOMS r ON r.room_num =p.room_num WHERE play_date=#{play_date} AND p.theater_num=#{theater_num} AND concat(p.play_date,' ',p.play_start_time) >= DATE_ADD(SYSDATE(), interval 20 minute) ORDER BY movie_name_kr ,p.room_num ,play_start_time;
